bibl.title: An Amulet Containing Acts 9:1
bibl.note: Provenance unknown, late third / fourth century. Probably an amulet. - Introduction. - Text and Commentary. - The Apotropaic Use of P.Harr. inv. 486 and Acts 9:1.
bibl.seg: Lincoln H. Blumell, An Amulet Containing Acts 9:1.
